Posts.Content: I just had a TURP procedure on the 15th, slept rite through it. I needed to get the size of the prostate to be eligible for HIFU. There's a little pain during the recovery, I was only in the hospital for 24 hours (with catheter).
Posts.Signature: Age 53 Current PSA 0.037 Big thanks to "Doc" Lazar and Brandon Oct 2010 PSA 3.5 , the PA thought he would keep this one to himself Feb 2012 PSA 6.5 April 2012 PSA 4.2 April 2012 16 core Biopsy 1 Core "Small Amount"(15%) of cancer 15 Negitive Gleason 6 (3+3) Second "MRI guided" Biopsy noted 2 masses Now What?
Posts.Title: Turp
